string.text: d1
d2
Help... Help...
Whoa... Yeah, Mr. Soldier, I see you've been damaged fair much...
Screw you, scoundrel!
Are you the... hum... monolithian? I've he-e-ard... colonel called you so..
If I were one of them, you would have no chance to talk now... I am Branded one, stalker. And what kind of nut are you?
Me... corporal... Johnny Luckless...
Yeah, well I see that.
Who... who else has survived?
Not likely. Damn, I should have a medical aid from the doctor not from the medikit.
Apparently, it's my time to go... with comrades...
Hush for a while. Sooner or later we'll all be there.
Well, I'm not holding you back.
Thanks, man... Colonel told...that you all had to be some kind of inhuman brutes here... kh... whilst you seem to be pretty adequate...
You certainly can find some brutes here. Tell me more, who did it to you?
No, my friend. I'm not really adequate - it just looks to be so. I'm going to fry you and eat... in fact, forget the fry stuff.

Like total newbies... hem... There was a radiochemical reconnaissance... conducted by the copters... they had too much confidence in those ones... and \nwhere obliterated in a jiffy... And then you column was blocked up... and as well was screwed... Only I made it.. to... knock a couple of foes off..
Fighting-cocks.. It took a few seconds for you to appear here! The radar has just shut down.
A month here... two steps from here, on the border of the zone we were... fully prepared.. Battle.. the battle still there?..
This is the case in point. Someone was really noisy there.
Maybe someone of us, alive... could settle there... We had... a task - to capture the path to Sarco... hk... khe... Sarcophagus... if something happens - we must \nwait for reinforcements..
Reinforcements?
Our pop... colonel told that there should be merely no rebuff there... just beasts... few monstrosities...
So what's with the reinforcements?
There is the task force... as well, once we have failed, they'll begin... I though we'll make a skirmish there... keh... a bit... and the battle broke out here... Don't \nwalk straight the road...
Goofy! What was it about the task force?... Look at me! Don't close your eyes, well!
A-a-a, it hurts!.. Oh, take me home... no chance to break through without the copters...
Sergeant?
Yes... sergeant Luck Lessy... The enemy has minimum three machine-gun dots, several snipers... Man, you'd better not.. don't go there... keh..
Few more seconds, sergeant! When a hell... When this cursed task force arrives?
Huh?.. Stalker... task force... we were knocked out, it... now....
Now? Oh my gosh...
Kh... And you... what have brought you here... kh...
I wanted to get to the Monolith, but there you are...

I would... also like to glance at it... but, apparently it's not my fate... take my PDA... keh... there is a sarcophagus assault plan...\nAll our groupings... are indicated ... Perhaps, you will be lucky ... to break through... and Monolith will... grant your wish...
Thanks.
